page.title: 08Education
page.content: The Sunflower Nursery in Melgund Place caters for the needs of pre-school children from 3.5 years old.There are 100 children attending on a half day basis from Monday to Friday. There are 3 Primary Schools in the town for pupils aged 5 years to 12 years. {OPENED ROLL {(1985) South School ...... 1912 230 West School ...... 1879,1910 265 St. Patricks R.C .. 1905 116 In addition Lochgelly North School{ was opened in 1959 for mentally handicapped children. A new high school is scheduled to open in 1988 to be known as {Lochgelly High School,}which will replace Auchterderran J.H.S and Beath J.H.S.
